onfig"
	enchelpers "github.com/containers/ocicrypt/helpers"
	"github.com/spf13/cobra"
)

type imagePushOptions struct {
	global                   *globalOptions
	deprecatedTLSVerify      *deprecatedTLSVerifyOption
	srcImage                 *imageOptions
	destImage                *imageDestOptions
	retryOpts                *retry.Options
	additionalTags           []string                  // For do

etryOpts                *retry.Options
	additionalTags           []string                  // For docker-archive: destinations, in addition to the name:tag specified as destination, also add these
	removeSignatures         bool                      // Do not copy signatures from the source image
	signByFingerprint        string                    // Sign the image using a GPG key with the specifie

gnByFingerprint        string                    // Sign the image using a GPG key with the specified fingerprint
	signBySigstoreParamFile  string                    // Sign the image using a sigstore signature per configuration in a param file
	signBySigstorePrivateKey string                    // Sign the image using a sigstore private key
	signPassphraseFile       string                    // P
